txt.en: You have taken the weapons of the spear-throwing goblins of Khadar-zarâm, making the stair safer for those who wish to leave Moria through the eastern door.

Spear-wielding goblins threaten all who hope to descend the stair of Khadar-zarâm. You should collect spears from the goblins that perch atop the stair, aiming their malice at passers-by hoping to leave Moria.
You have taken the weapons of the spear-throwing goblins of Khadar-zarâm, making the stair safer for those who wish to leave Moria through the eastern door.
Spear-wielding goblins threaten all who hope to descend the stair of Khadar-zarâm.
Spear-wielding goblins can be found atop Khadar-zarâm.\n\nYou should collect spears from the lethal goblins.
